A couple of things do come to my mind right away about orc captains:

1)they should be able to have attack called "Summon Formation".  This 
would work something like "Summon Defense", but much, much stronger.  
Really weak opponent orcs might be enticed by this "Summon Formation" 
attack.

2)orcs should be receive some benefits from being near an orc captain 
of the same team.  Otherwise, why call it "Orc Captain"?  Some of the 
benefits could be increased accuracy, increased hit points, etc . . 
enough to justify having both an orc and orc captain on the team.

3)Throwing a net over an opponent to immobilize the opponent would be 
a great attack for an orc captain.

10:02am Monday morning in case this post gets delayed.
